id.name: modulatorIsStatic
id.text: Modulator does not react to value changes

id.name: modulatorValueExpression
id.text: Expression to evaluate when calculating the midi message value from the modulator value

id.name: modulatorValueExpressionReverse
id.text: Expression to evaluate when calculating the modulator value from the midi message value

id.name: modulatorControllerExpression
id.text: Expression to evaluate when calculating the modulator value from midi controller message

id.name: modulatorMuteOnStart
id.text: Modulator does not output any MIDI during startup

id.name: modulatorMute
id.text: Modulator does not output any MIDI

id.name: modulatorLinkedToComponent
id.text: Link to what type of MODULATOR property

id.name: modulatorMax
id.text: Maximum value the modulator can have, should be set from the UI component

id.name: modulatorMin
id.text: Minimum value the modulator can have, should be set from the UI component

id.name: modulatorExcludeFromSnapshot
id.text: Don't send this modulator during snapshots

id.name: modulatorVstNameFormat
id.text: A format string (just like the label property for displaying changed modulators) that will report the name to the Host

id.text: Properties panel on the right side

id.name: uiPanelInvisibleComponentAlpha
id.text: Alpha for invisible components in edit mode

id.text: MIDI input from host compared to modulators

id.text: Send MIDI snapshot after program change

id.text: Send program request on program change

id.text: Ignore realtime MIDI messages on input

id.text: Show progress bar window when sending snapshot

id.text: Unique panel ID for plugin instances (4 characters)

id.text: Ctrlr revision that this panel was saved with

id.text: Vendor that made the device that this panel controls

id.text: Modulator list XML modulator element name

id.text: Display property IDs instead of full descriptions

id.text: How long messages should appear on screen (ms)

id.name: panelLastSaveDir
id.text: Directory last used for panel save

id.text: Is component a member of a group

id.text: Component size and position is locked

id.text: Send MIDI from other members of the group

id.text: Component changes will not appear in labels that display them

id.text: Decimal places to print if using floating point numbers

id.text: Called when a mouse is moved over this component

id.text: Called when a mouse is down on this component

id.text: Called when a mouse is dragged (down + left click) over this component

id.text: Called when a double-click event occurs on this component

id.text: Internal function this component should execute

id.text: The value to set when double clicked

id.text: Modifies the best number of decimal places to use when displaying this slider's value

id.text: Instead of contents display dynamic values

id.text: Called when a file is double clicked

id.text: Called when the label contents changes

id.text: Normal slider, links to continues numeric values

id.text: Slider that has a list of pre-defined values

id.text: Like normal Slider but with custom graphics

id.name: uiImageButton
id.text: Like a Button but with custom graphics for on/off states

id.text: A combo box with a list of values

id.name: uiImage
id.text: Displays and image from a resource

id.name: uiCustomComponent
id.text: A custom component which is drawn and handled within LUA

id.text: Number of banks the device has
